name: Jam Packed Fic Pack
description:
This is our collection of the first 3 tiny games made by creator Zack Slansky, 2 silly and 1 serious. 

In Beetle Boy, traverse a strange world on the brink of destruction - and hopefully get computer privileges back. 

Gang Simulator tasks you with becoming the Gang Lord of the city at all costs, while deconstructing masculinity and our tough exteriors in the silliest way possible.

Last Train at Corkscrew is a short playable poem about war and memory.
